verses.verse: ( allāh kī satāish karo!) shukrguzārī kī qurbānī ke lie zabūr. ai pūrī duniyā, ḳhushī ke nāre lagā kar rab kī madahsarāī karo!
ḳhushī se rab kī ibādat karo, jashn manāte hue us ke huzūr āo!
jān lo ki rab hī ḳhudā hai. usī ne hameṅ ḳhalaq kiyā, aur ham us ke haiṅ, us kī qaum aur us kī charāgāh kī bheṛeṅ.
shukr karte hue us ke darwāzoṅ meṅ dāḳhil ho, satāish karte hue us kī bārgāhoṅ meṅ hāzir ho. us kā shukr karo, us ke nām kī tamjīd karo!
kyūṅki rab bhalā hai. us kī shafqat abadī hai, aur us kī wafādārī pusht-dar-pusht qāim hai.
